entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
